mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_address, member_address_detail, member_post, member_team_code, member_img) values(#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_phone}, #{member_email}, #{member_address}, #{member_address_detail}, #{member_post}, #{member_team_code}, #{member_img})
